OrgName.entry: HILLSBOROUGH LEISURE CENTRE - YOGA AND PILATES

Desc.entry: Mind, body and soul fitness classes, which include pilates, physical yoga and hatha yoga. Taught by qualified tutors from the British Wheel of Yoga.

DisabledAccess.entry: Lift to upper floors, Disabled parking

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10.15-11am (pilates), Tues 8-8.45pm (pilates), Wed 1.30-2.30pm (pilates), 8-9.30pm (yoga), Thurs 10.15-11am (pilates), Fri 11am-12.15pm (yoga), 6.30-7.30pm (pilates), Sun 10-11am (tai chi yoga)
